panels.description: Total number of ready pods in all namespaces
panels.title: Ready pods

panels.description: Total not ready in all namespaces

targets.expr: count((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", phase="Running"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", condition="true"} == 0)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Unready pods

panels.description: Total number of pending pods in all namespaces
panels.title: Pending pods

panels.description: Total number of ready containers in all namespaces
panels.title: Ready containers

panels.description: Total number of  unready containers in all namespaces

targets.expr: count((kube_pod_container_status_running{cluster="$Cluster"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster"} == 0)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Unready containers

panels.description: Total number of pending containers in all namespaces
panels.title: Pending containers

panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: Memory wss usage in all namespaces in bytes

panels.description: Memory requests in all namespaces in bytes
panels.title: Memory requests

panels.description: Memory limits in all namespaces in bytes
panels.title: Memory limits

panels.description: Namespace status by namespace

targets.expr: count by (namespace)((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", phase="Running"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", condition="true"} == 1))
count by(namespace)((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", phase="Running"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", condition="true"} == 0)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Namespace status

panels.description: CPU usage per  namespace in cores
panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: TOP CPU usage per namespace/pod in cores
panels.title: TOP Pod CPU Usage

panels.description: Memory wss usage per namespace in bytes
panels.title: Memory usage

panels.description: TOP Pod Memory wss usage per namespace/pod in bytes
panels.title: TOP Pod Memory Usage

panels.description:
Network bandwidth  per namespace in bytes/sec

If pods in the Namespace have host network enabled, the graph represents the network traffic of the host

Check it in Cluster node > Network PODs
panels.title: Network Bandwidth

panels.description: TOP Pod network bandwith per namespace/pod in bytes

targets.expr: topk(20, sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", pod!=''}[2m])) by (namespace, pod) + sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", pod!=''}[2m])) by (namespace, pod)))

panels.title: TOP Pod Network Bandwith

panels.description: Filesystem throughput per namespace in bytes/sec
panels.title: Filesystem Throughput

panels.description: TOP Pod filesystem throughput per namespace/pod in bytes/sec

targets.expr: topk(20, sort_desc(sum(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", container!=''}[2m])) by (namespace, pod) + sum(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", container!=''}[2m])) by (namespace, pod)))

panels.title: TOP Pod Filesystem Throughput

panels.description: Ready pods per namespace in # of pods

targets.expr: count by(namespace)((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", phase="Running"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", condition="true"} == 1))

panels.title: Ready pods

panels.description: Unready / Pending pods per namespace in # of pods

targets.expr: count by(namespace)((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", phase="Running"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", condition="true"} == 0)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Unready / Pending pods

panels.description: Ready containers per namespace in # of pods
panels.title: Ready containers

panels.description: Unready / Pending containers per namespace in # of pods

targets.expr: count by(namespace)((kube_pod_container_status_running{cluster="$Cluster"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster"} == 0)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Unready / Pending containers

panels.description: Pods restarts per namespace in # of restarts
panels.title: Container Restarts

panels.description: TOP POD Container restarts per namespace/pod  in # of restarts
panels.title: TOP POD Container Restarts
